Package com.sicomsa.dmt

Class CredentialsProxy

java.lang.Object
com.sicomsa.dmt.CredentialsProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Credentials
Direct Known Subclasses:
BatchFactory.StoredCredentials
public abstract class CredentialsProxy extends Object implements Credentials
Abstract implementation of Credentials. Does not load the certificate until needed.

To create a concrete CredentialsProxy you need to implement:

  • doGetCredentials()
Since:
1.0
Version:
2025.01.03
Author:
Beto Lopez
